thread.title: Link-Assistant.Com Introduces Cloud Storage to SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle Projects
thread.title_full: Link-Assistant.Com Introduces Cloud Storage to SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle Projects

author: Aleh Barysevich
title: Link-Assistant.Com Introduces Cloud Storage to SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle Projects
text:
Link-Assistant.Com , the software house behind SEO PowerSuite SEO software and BuzzBundle social media software, announced introduction of cloud storage to their products . From now on, SEO and SMM projects can be stored in the Web for easy collaboration and access from anywhere. The update includes two web solutions for one’s projects: the in-house online storage service, SEO PowerSuite Cloud, and the fully-integrated Dropbox. "Today's update is a breakthrough, as it bridges the gap between desktop and online tools. Desktop tools are favored for unlimited data, powerful functionality and minimized costs. Online tools are chosen for easy collaboration and access from anywhere. SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle users can now enjoy benefits of both options: at the lowest price in the industry , they'll still have unlimited data and most powerful features combined with streamlined team work and access in cloud," says Aleh Barysevich, CMO and Co-Founder, Link-Assistant.Com.
The 3 benefits that cloud project storage brings to SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle users are the following:
1. Project access from anywhere
Users can now work on their projects in the office, at home, while traveling and wherever they want.
2. Data safety
Most advanced technologies are used to ensure one’s account’s privacy, security and emergency back-up.
3. Team collaboration
A shareable project link can be sent to partners and team members and clients for collaboration, so that everyone with a link can view stats and make changes.
The new storage options are available to all licensed SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle users. Both tools are available for free download at the company’s official website. More information on the new feature is available at http://www.link-assistant.com/news/cloud-project-storage.html .
About Link-Assistant.Com, SEO PowerSuite and BuzzBundle
Link-Assistant.Com is the software company behind SEO PowerSuite (SEO software) and BuzzBundle (social media management software). The company's mission is to provide the digital marketing community with tools with the most advanced functionality at the most affordable price. In October 2015, SEO PowerSuite was named finalist for the recognized US Search Awards in the category 'Best SEO Software'.
